titleInfo.title: Words and Music series at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and yellow on white) announcing Words and Music, a songwriting workshop for students, at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum. Poster features a woodcut of the Nashville skyline.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
